text: Robert Rinder, (born 31 May 1978 in Southgate, London also known as Rob Rinder, is a British criminal barrister and television presenter. He is best known on ITV as Judge Rinder in the reality series Judge Rinder since 2014 and as a standby presenter on the weekday breakfast programme Good Morning Britain. In 2016, he became the host of Judge Rinder's Crime Stories where he reconstructs real crimes. He was also a dancer in the BBC One dancing show Strictly Come Dancing. ==Personal life== Rinder was born into a Jewish family in Southgate. He is the grandchild of a Holocaust survivor. title: Robert Rinder
